RT @themargin_us: WE‚ÄôRE LIVE with our first feature, We Glow In The Dark by @firstarai!!

Photo Credit: Ariel Cobb‚Ä¶

The series of stories @themargin_us has lined up is incredible‚Äì it is amazing to see @BryceCracknell lead such a thoughtful and intelligent team to focus on telling these important stories in innovative and empathetic new ways, and I'm proud to be a part of it
‚úÇÔ∏èüíéAnd of course, some maps, graphics, and scraps from the cutting room floor- full sourcing / methodology for this story on GitHub here: https://t.co/40T7nn4RQF https://t.co/efTvbDWmb1

‚åõüü•We were also able to incorporate a historical HOLC redlining map from @HOLCRedlining (https://t.co/U8DvUoSa6X) - who graciously provide georectified scans + shapefiles for tons of US cities, you can explore the redline map more here: https://t.co/FuUI1gLl4M https://t.co/VR47Pl8PUL

üó∫Ô∏èüë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüë¶‚Äçüë¶The story is really all about geography and proximity of the community to this toxic location, so the main focus for the interactive was a map that shows you how where the main characters and locations are in relation to the depot https://t.co/hYBavZf6Hh
üí£üå≤I knew about Superfund sites but I was surprised at how many there are spread all across the country- 22% of the US lives within 3 miles of the US according to the EPA https://t.co/foT1eCRMBY

‚ú®üöÄReally excited to be part of putting together @firstarai's story with @themargin_us and @EarthGenome focusing on Memphis Depot, a toxic superfund site, and the ways the community surrounding it have been sickeningly mistreated: https://t.co/7aFKGFHzlj https://t.co/pSVjsC3IzQ
